title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic threads
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade)
description: Long silk textile, probably a shoulder cloth (selendang), in dark brown against red. Plaid ground with all-over brocading of geometric pattern with center motif on main ground. Heavy brocading in borders.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 19th century.Medium: silk, metallic threads
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade). 1961-115-6.
